name: io.github.verygoodplugins/mcp-freescout
title: MCP FreeScout
description: FreeScout ticket management with AI-powered analysis, search filters, and structured outputs.

environmentVariables.name: FREESCOUT_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: FreeScout API key with read/write permissions

environmentVariables.name: FREESCOUT_DEFAULT_USER_ID
environmentVariables.description: Default user ID for ticket operations

tools.name: freescout_get_ticket
tools.description: Fetch a FreeScout ticket by ID or URL with full thread history

tools.name: freescout_analyze_ticket
tools.description: Analyze ticket to determine issue type, root cause, and suggested solution

tools.name: freescout_search_tickets
tools.description: Search tickets with explicit filters: assignee ('unassigned'|'any'|userId), status, updatedSince/createdSince (supports '7d', '24h'), pagination

tools.name: freescout_add_note
tools.description: Add internal note to a ticket

tools.name: freescout_create_draft_reply
tools.description: Create a draft reply for human review before sending

tools.name: freescout_get_ticket_context
tools.description: Get ticket context and customer info for personalized replies
